name: This is Not Pepito | Test
description:
Some explanation of this shit

This is a mini game, for the final project of some schoolmates. I did it in 1 night, since his companions, after more than 3 months were unable to do something as simple as this.

It is very improvable, but I didn't want to touch it much more.

What cost me the most is the list, the verification of the objects, that would not be repeated, etc ...

And I had to make some small modifications to the title and the main character, since the school took away the copyright of anything we did there. (Good school work)

There is much more history behind this, but I would give for a book.
